name: RadishTeacher
description:
Automatically update purchase price 0.99 USD / week. Subscription fees will be credited to your iTunes account upon confirmation of your purchase and at the beginning of each renewal period. You can cancel the subscription or free trial in iTunes settings at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period，the cancellation will take effect on the last day of the current subscription period.
If you purchase subscription packages during the free trial period, the unused part of the subscription package will start charging. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Privacy Policy：https://docs.google.com/document/d/17wUIc0SZpMcqLR9dlVlkk_ooQp3pMThg2ROSmem2lA8/edit?usp=sharing

Terms of use：https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IeZwFQMDimYal_jVKcoPNfvvDPMxN6N0z0sm-2AXcDQ/edit?usp=sharing
